comments:
Version: WSWB 1.0 + wswb rollup 1 
Platform: Windows 2000 (have not tested on Linux) 
Severity: Stop ship 
Product: WSDD 

When you try to use the software update mechanism with rollup 1, it does not 
start up, instead you get an internal error. 
This is very severe for WSDD as we are using the software update as a basis of 
our product. This is currently a stop ship item for us. 

Steps to recreate: 
1) Install and start WSWB 1.0 
2) Activate the Software Updates menu item 
        - Perspective -> Customize... 
        - expand Other 
        - select Software Updates 
3) Select Help -> Software Updates 
        - the Software Updates window comes up fine 
4) Close WSWB and install rollup 1 
5) Start WSWB 
6) Select Help -> Software Updates 
        - you get an error dialog 
9) dismiss dialog and try the Software updates again 
        - you get a different error dialog 

Here is the output from the log:

This is a build problem in org.eclipse.core.boot plugin. The boot.jar is 
missing org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.messages.properties file.

traces.message: Can't  find bundle for base name org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.messages, locale en_US
